website_summaries.verdict: Although it's a disappointment Sony hasn't increased the screen resolution along with its size, and the camera's quirks are rather odd, the Xperia Z3 Compact's improved design, vast amounts of power, decent battery life and waterproof body help it maintain its position as one of the best mini flagships around.
pros: The Sony Xperia Z3 Compact packs a larger screen than its predecessor in the same size body, it has tonnes of power, it's completely waterproof allowing for underwater photography and it has a good camera
cons: The screen size has increased, but not the resolution, resulting in a less sharp image overall than its predecessor and many of its rivals
Although the camera takes good shots, its resolution is throttled in automatic mode and the white balance isn't perfect

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this phone
customer_reviews.text: - Back glass cracked within a week for no apparent reason. - Headphone jack shorted within 2 weeks. - No warranty :/ - Phone not meant to be submerged, the camera may accrue condensation. + Battery life lasts 2 days with average use (net browsing, music, calls & text) + Decent front & back camera quality
customer_reviews.author: Trevor M

customer_reviews.title: Works well as of now
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using a couple of days, but battery life is exceptional. I used Apple phones in the past charging 2 times a day and simply couldn't handle looking for places to plug in. Phone is compact has great feel and appears to be of great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GWESS

customer_reviews.title: Back of phone cracked without being dropped
customer_reviews.text: The back of the phone cracked on its own. Sony has yet to answer me on steps to take in order to repair it. Other than that this is a great phone, the colour is beautiful and the display is vibrant
customer_reviews.author: Émanuelle Dubbeldam

customer_reviews.title: Horrible phone. Expensive and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This phone sucks so bad!! I hate it. I spent so much money on it and within a week it craked and never worked again i should have returned it when i had the chance!! Never buying this again
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Morales

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, Poor buy
customer_reviews.text: Back cracked within one week without dropping and in a protector. Charger faulty on arrival. Looks good, Poor buy.
customer_reviews.author: J N Beadle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Green isnt forest green, but rather seafoam and debatable as to categorically green
customer_reviews.author: T. P. O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing, I have no problems with it whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Delano S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice phone and cool colour
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife and she loves is dearly. Very nice phone and cool colour.
customer_reviews.author: Dilip Kumar

customer_reviews.title: It's easily my favorite for being swift and useful
customer_reviews.text: This is the third smartphone I've ever owned. It's easily my favorite for being swift and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Pacific Whitefox

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone - Correct Size.
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone, compact and sleek design. I would have given 5 if the internals were also more substantive.
customer_reviews.author: SHANKAR RAMAN

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fragile: back of phone cracked on first drop. The phone did not last 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, the battery life is amazing and its beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: I love the battery life and specs on this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love the battery life and specs on this phone. My big upset is the fragility of this thing. I bought 2, one for myself and one for my husband. But they both break so easy. I had a case on mine and dropped it and the back still shattered. My husband slightly dropped it and the screen shattered. We bought the glass and my husband fixed it, but now it is no longer water proof/resistant. It has good processing power. It's very fast and beautiful to look at. It's just too damn easy to break it. That is why I went with 3 instead of 4 stars. If it had better casing I would give it 4.5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone for it's size. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is great. There isn't any much phones out there that comes in this size that can compete with the spec it offers. The OS have some added Sony fluff that can be disabled right away but it doesn't take away from the android experience. Although I wished that it had a bigger internal memory, it's not a big issue since it does support microSD. Played with the camera a bit impressed with the image quality but weak at low light settings. Flash is not as powerful as other phones I had.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Zhang

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product for my brother who needed a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my brother who needed a phone. He did not want an iPhone or samasung phone .he is more an a soney kinda guy. So I bought him this phone he dropped the phone once and it was done! We send the phone to get fixed and again it broke very fast. They don't sell cases for this phone buying this phones means having to repair it after repair
customer_reviews.author: Erlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, but ver very delicate
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone, but ver very delicate, after 2 weeks screen broke, was my own fault, but other phones I had before weren't nearly as sensitive...
customer_reviews.author: Janine Cziepluch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone but horrible seller
customer_reviews.text: The Xperia Z3 could be the best compact smartphone but the delivery sucks! Also the charger in the box didn't work at all. All in all, it is highly recommended to buy this phone but not here
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A NICE PHONE I LIKE IT, PHONE IS SO BEAUTIFUL THANKS,
customer_reviews.author: hanuman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone
customer_reviews.text: The Sony Xperia Z3 Compact is a nice phone and its performance is great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mutale

customer_reviews.title: great form factor
customer_reviews.text: Highly responsive, great form factor, and with a great fit & finish, I would recommend this phone to anyone in the market for a new android phone.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It's all about the size
customer_reviews.text: Good: The best "small" phone out there right now. The battery life is amazing. I use Reddit, Gmail, Maps, Chrome, SoundCloud, Bleacher Report, etc throughout the day and by the time I get to bed (~1am) there is still 50% battery left. Screen is bright and sharp. The dedicated camera button. Bad: The camera app has an error that pops up when you start the app. Slight lag when starting the camera app. The volume button being right next to the power button. Phone vibrates when playing audio loudly. Recommended? If you are fighting the trend of bigger phones then this is the phone for you! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

product_meta.title: Sony Xperia Z3 Compact D5803 Green Factory Unlocked LTE GSM 4.6" [LTE:700/800/850/900/1700/1800/1900/2100/2600]
product_meta.description: With the highest waterproof rating, the Xperia Z3 Compact lets you answer calls in the rain or take pictures in the pool.
feature_bullets: Importatn : Please Check WITH YOUR NETWORK PROVIDER the compatibility before you buy.

Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20, Straight Talk, and select prepaid carriers). Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin.
This cell phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones
